name: Anaitsa
text: Contact toxin inflicts 1 @paralysis@ per hit.

name: Black glove
text: Named for having dark hairs.

name: Chuche
text: Fortify magic means take +3 magic and astros (???; ends when you take mana shock).

name: Creampod
text: Grows ampoules that fill with a dairy-like substance, roughly half water.

name: Futago
text: Is fireproof and generally quite stubborn.

name: Golden lady
text: Named for having densely-packed yellow hairs.

name: Lover's kiss
text: Contact sedative inflicts 2 @fatigue@ per hit.

name: Mie laz
text: Contact toxin inflicts 1 Injury per hit.

name: Mindai
effect: contraceptive 11 (works on both men and women)

name: Twinwort
text: Tends to make flowers.

name: Vichas
text: Contact neurotoxin inflicts 1 @Blind@ per hit.

name: Aokla
text: Grows a cotton-alike that's very easy to bind into cloth; considered tacky, but perfectly utilitarian.

name: Blaster
text: Grows pods that fill with something pressurised and explosive that goes off on contact. These deflate aeoc after being picked.

name: Carmineroot
text: It grows very profusely, so can overwhelm areas very easily. Often nicknamed chokeweed when chimerised with vines.

name: Dash corn
text: Grows maize-like ears absurdly fast (eg one per day); however, they rot just as fast.

name: Firelace
text: Grows pink-red sacs that burst into POW=8 fires on contact. These deflate aeoc after being picked, but can be stabilised into firestarters with salt.

name: Harak
text: A magical 'echolocator'; nearby Hezulim get +10 to see anything near this.

name: Modaga
text: A relay phyto; if growing near a nexus, can transfer its mana flux to within a 50m radius. Slow-growing, and it doesn't create extra mana, just redirects it.

name: Oamol
text: Condenses huge amounts of water.

name: Pao jiat
text: Its spores dump the target circa one minute into the future.

name: Twitchweed
text: It can teleport, usually moving between choke points.

name: Aparak
text: It's easy to bind pocket dimensions to these.

name: Inzun
text: Contact toxin inflicts -2 magic on hit and gives itself +1 combat.

name: Helgaskera
text: Secretes lots of edible oil.

name: Limaganda
text: Secretes lots of glue. Pods can be thrown as grenades with @goop@.

name: Noi wan
text: On contact, twists gravity to launch target into the air, aimed to make them land on high ledges.

name: Snowbinder
text: Attracts snow; as such is quite easy to find and exterminate.

name: Taiyo
text: Produces pods with @light@ 1 that can be thrown as flash grenades inflicting @dazzle@ 3.

name: Brambleroot
text: Consistently has thorns.

name: Umberos
text: Exudes an anti-light aura; it and everything within 1m is pitch black, and up to 2m is dim. This overrides @light@s and can only be cancelled with antimagic 15+.

name: Yunzo
text: Creates pit traps around itself.

name: Honeycup
text: Rapidly produces cupfuls of honey.

name: Inkblot
text: Produces a powerful blue-black dye that's highly visible to blue magic senses.

name: Jaut
text: Those caught are sent into the future. Those attempting to harvest it are rumoured to be sent even further.

name: Kobal
text: Makes its mundane fruit grow very quickly.

name: Nezema
text: Contact resin inflicts 2 @goop@.

name: Pilo
text: Grows hornet-like creatures that attack anyone who gets too close.

name: Shaika
text: Self-hybridises with multiple nearby flora and grows fruit for all.

name: Stone root
text: Incorporates rock into its structural matrix. Very tough, used by kaiju to build stuff. Uses a mixture of minerals: quartz, calcite, aragonite, hydroxyapatite, etc. Other plants grow in cracks, making it more of a biocomposite matrix.
